last_episode_to_air.name: Smashing the Box Office
last_episode_to_air.overview: Filmmakers and actors weigh in on whether real change in the Hollywood system is possible; the solutions aren't easy, but the determination is there.

name: What Happens in Hollywood
overview: Framing people's ideas about sex and sexuality with A-list interviews and compelling archive footage; Emmy-winning director Marina Zenovich looks at how sex and power interact at every stage of filmmaking.

episodes.name: The Big Picture
episodes.overview: The Hollywood system is currently undergoing tremendous upheaval; the power structures are being challenged on all levels.

episodes.name: The Gatekeepers
episodes.overview: To even get a foot in the door in Hollywood, they need help from the gatekeepers -- the agents; they can be a great help, but they can also keep out those who are often marginalized.

episodes.name: The Write Stuff
episodes.overview: Historically, the stories being told have not reflected the diversity of their audience.

episodes.name: The Casting Couch
episodes.overview: Auditions are a necessary part of the process in casting a movie, but people in power have taken advantage and preyed upon actors.

episodes.name: Studio City
episodes.overview: Studios decide what projects get made, and how much they're willing to spend; agents and directors offer their views on navigating this complex system.

episodes.name: On Location
episodes.overview: The power dynamics on a film set are difficult to navigate and in that complicated environment, women are often the ones who suffer the most.

episodes.name: Below the Line
episodes.overview: While directors, writers, and actors are more visible in the film industry, there are many others in equally important roles behind the scenes; crew members speak out on their working conditions.

episodes.name: The Hard Sell
episodes.overview: Once a film is completed, there comes the arduous task of attracting audience members; how much marketing a film gets and how it is presented is a big point of contention.

episodes.name: What Are You Wearing?
episodes.overview: Women have grown tired of being reduced to their dresses and appearances on the red carpet; movements are rising to combat this brand of misogyny.

episodes.name: Smashing the Box Office
episodes.overview: Filmmakers and actors weigh in on whether real change in the Hollywood system is possible; the solutions aren't easy, but the determination is there.
